de.lmu.dbs.jforest.util.workergroup
Class WorkerGroup

java.lang.Object
  de.lmu.dbs.jforest.util.workergroup.WorkerGroup
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClassificationWorkerGroup, ExpansionWorkerGroup, RandomTreeWorkerGroup
public abstract class WorkerGroup
extends java.lang.Object

Manages workers to to one distributed job multithreaded.

Author:
Thomas Weber
